Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 74th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2008...
Earned first career win on 4/11/2013...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/17/2013, off Scott Mathieson (PIT)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 6/22/2021 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/7/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Traded from Cleveland to Toronto on 1/31/2023 (Going to TOR: P A. Catron. Going to CLE: RF A. Dapena)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/7/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
